summary: A test suite that validates the proper propagation and transformation of name‑stack metadata through JAX control‑flow primitives (cond, scan, while_loop) when applying automatic‑differentiation (grad, jvp) and vectorization (vmap) operations.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable debugging and tracing information for developers by confirming that name‑stack handling remains correct across differentiated and vectorized control‑flow constructs in JAX.
